sentences.english: Salt flats in the west prevent a direct road from connecting to Kigoma.
sentences.chinese: 西部的鹽鹼沼澤地使道路不能直接連接尅高馬。

sentences.english: All the tours to the salt flats are really standard.
sentences.chinese: 所有來鹽鹼地的旅行都非常程序化。

sentences.english: One of ecological crises people were facing was land salt- alkalinization.
sentences.chinese: 土壤鹽鹼化是人類面臨的生態危機之一。

sentences.english: Of major benefit would be introducing different and improved rice varieties with greater salinity tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 最爲有益的做法是採用不同和改良的耐鹽鹼稻米品種。
歐洲鹽鹼溼地生長的紫菀。

sentences.english: Subsurface drain pipe system is a practical and effective solution to the improvement of submerged land and saline land.
sentences.chinese: 暗管排水是改良低溼地和治理鹽鹼土有效的工程措施。

sentences.english: Highway afforestation in saline and alkaline land can hardly succeed due to the damage from saline soil.
sentences.chinese: 鹽鹼地區的公路綠化受鹽鹼危害不易成功。

sentences.english: Highway afforestation in saline and alkaline land can hardly succeed due to the damage from saline soil.
sentences.chinese: 鹽鹼地區的公路綠化受鹽鹼危害不易成功。

sentences.english: Highly mineralized groundwater can be explored from strongly salinized land thus producing mirabilite and table salt.
sentences.chinese: 重度鹽鹼地可開採高礦化地下水，生產芒硝和食鹽。

sentences.english: Oriental sheatfish is one of economic fish for saline-alkali fishery wetlands in Songnen Plain.
sentences.chinese: 鮎魚是松嫩平原鹽鹼溼地重要的高值食用魚類之一。

sentences.english: The salt marshes and mud flats attract large numbers of waterfowl.
sentences.chinese: 鹽鹼地和泥灘吸引了大量水鳥。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the application of microorganism fertilizer to forestation on saline-alkali soil should be popularized.
sentences.chinese: 可以推廣活性微生物菌肥在鹽鹼地造林方面的應用。

sentences.english: A great quantity of soluble inorganic salt can force the surrounding soil seriously become salinization and alkalinization.
sentences.chinese: 大量可溶性無機鹽會加劇周邊土壤的鹽鹼化。

sentences.english: We put them through mud and salt to make sure they won't rust.
sentences.chinese: 我們讓它們通過泥漿和鹽鹼灘以保證不生鏽。

sentences.english: And the limit of alkaline resistance of Puccinellia tenuiflora seedlings was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並就星星草幼苗耐鹽鹼的極限進行了討論。

sentences.english: The salinization of soil has already become an important environmental problem limiting the agricultural productivity.
sentences.chinese: 土壤鹽鹼化已經成爲制約農業發展的嚴重問題。
